name: Giant Moth
description: The Giant Moth is a small, whimsical creature with an elegant shape and delicate wings, embodying a unique aspect of forested environments.
memorable: Its ability to create a cloud of powder can blind opponents, providing tactical advantages.
goals: Typically found in forests, often evading threats and searching for food.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other small forest creatures, potentially prey to larger predators.
strengths: Good at stealth and capable of evasion with its flight speed.
weaknesses: Fragile with low hit points, lacks offensive potency.
attacks: Uses its proboscis to deliver piercing damage, effective against unsuspecting foes.
most_powerful_ability: Powdery Wings creates a cloud that can temporarily blind creatures, disrupting opponents in combat.
senses: Has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks based on smell due to its antennae.
skills: Proficient in Stealth and Perception, able to hide effectively and notice details.
additional_information: Triggered blindness ability can change combat dynamics.
Relatively slow and fragile, best suited for evasion.
Not a formidable opponent, mostly serves as environmental feature.
test_queries: small moth that can blind enemies
